languages.text: {n}Преподобный встречает слова Кибеллы спокойно, даже с какой-то величественной обреченностью. Он отвечает убийце:{/n} "Защитник народа и прислужница тирана — два верных служителя противоположных идей, две души, что ради долга отринули все прочее. Теперь истинно вижу, что ваше с ним столкновение было неизбежным".

{n}Adalbert meets Kibellah's words calmly, with almost majestic resignation.{/n} "A defender of the people and a tyrant's minion are two faithful servants of opposing ideas, two souls that have rejected everything else for the sake of duty. I now truly see that your collision with him was inevitable."
languages.original_text: {n}Преподобный встречает слова Кибеллы спокойно, даже с какой-то величественной обреченностью. Он отвечает убийце:{/n} "Защитник народа и прислужница тирана — два верных служителя противоположных идей, две души, что ради долга отринули все прочее. Теперь истинно вижу, что ваше с ним столкновение было неизбежным".

He answers the slayer:{/n} "A defender of the people and a tyrant's minion are two faithful servants of opposing ideas, two souls that have rejected everything else for the sake of duty. I now truly see that your collision with him was inevitable."

{n}Adalbert meets Kibellah's words calmly, with almost majestic resignation.{/n} "A defender of the people and a tyrant's minion are two faithful servants of opposing ideas, two souls that have rejected everything else for the sake of duty. I now truly see that your collision with him was inevitable."

{n}Adalbert meets Kibellah's words calmly, with almost majestic resignation.{/n} "A defender of the people and a tyrant's minion are two faithful servants of opposing ideas, two souls that have rejected everything else for the sake of duty. I now truly see that your collision with him was inevitable."

languages.text: {n}Adalbert begegnet Kibellahs Worten ruhig, mit fast majestätischer Resignation.{/n} "Ein Verteidiger des Volkes und ein Scherge eines Tyrannen sein beide treue Diener widerstreitender Ideen, zwei Seelen, die für die Pflicht alles andere abgelegt haben. Ich erkenne erst jetzt, dass Euer Zusammenprall mit ihm unvermeidlich war."
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert meets Kibellah's words calmly, with almost majestic resignation.{/n} "A defender of the people and a tyrant's minion are two faithful servants of opposing ideas, two souls that have rejected everything else for the sake of duty. I now truly see that your collision with him was inevitable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert begegnet Kibellahs Worten ruhig, mit fast majestätischer Resignation.{/n} "Ein Verteidiger des Volkes und ein Scherge eines Tyrannen sein beide treue Diener widerstreitender Ideen, zwei Seelen, die für die Pflicht alles andere abgelegt haben. Ich erkenne erst jetzt, dass Euer Zusammenprall mit ihm unvermeidlich war."

languages.text: {n}Adalbert escucha serenamente las palabras de Kibellah, con una resignación casi majestuosa.{/n} «Un defensor del pueblo y la secuaz de {mf|un tirano|una tirana} son dos siervos fieles de ideales opuestos, dos almas que han rechazado todo lo demás en aras del deber. Ahora me doy cuenta de que su colisión con él era inevitable».
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert meets Kibellah's words calmly, with almost majestic resignation.{/n} "A defender of the people and a tyrant's minion are two faithful servants of opposing ideas, two souls that have rejected everything else for the sake of duty. I now truly see that your collision with him was inevitable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert escucha serenamente las palabras de Kibellah, con una resignación casi majestuosa.{/n} «Un defensor del pueblo y la secuaz de {mf|un tirano|una tirana} son dos siervos fieles de ideales opuestos, dos almas que han rechazado todo lo demás en aras del deber. Ahora me doy cuenta de que su colisión con él era inevitable».

languages.text: {n}アダルバートはキベラの言葉に冷静に、嫌に強い覚悟をもって応えた。{/n}「民衆を守る者と暴君の手先、相反する思想に忠実な2人の従者、義務のために他のすべてを跳ね除けたふたつの魂。彼と君の衝突は必然だったのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert meets Kibellah's words calmly, with almost majestic resignation.{/n} "A defender of the people and a tyrant's minion are two faithful servants of opposing ideas, two souls that have rejected everything else for the sake of duty. I now truly see that your collision with him was inevitable."

traits.locale_text: {n}アダルバートはキベラの言葉に冷静に、嫌に強い覚悟をもって応えた。{/n}「民衆を守る者と暴君の手先、相反する思想に忠実な2人の従者、義務のために他のすべてを跳ね除けたふたつの魂。彼と君の衝突は必然だったのだ」

languages.text: {n}阿达伯特平静地听着绮贝菈的话，几乎带着庄严的态度，听天由命。{/n}“人民的捍卫者与暴君的仆从，这两位忠诚的仆人心怀彼此对立的思想，为了责任可以放弃一切。我现在真的明白了，你与他之间的冲突是不可避免的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert meets Kibellah's words calmly, with almost majestic resignation.{/n} "A defender of the people and a tyrant's minion are two faithful servants of opposing ideas, two souls that have rejected everything else for the sake of duty. I now truly see that your collision with him was inevitable."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿达伯特平静地听着绮贝菈的话，几乎带着庄严的态度，听天由命。{/n}“人民的捍卫者与暴君的仆从，这两位忠诚的仆人心怀彼此对立的思想，为了责任可以放弃一切。我现在真的明白了，你与他之间的冲突是不可避免的事情。”

languages.text: {n}Adalbert réagit aux accusations de Kibellah avec un calme imperturbable mâtiné de résignation majestueuse.{/n} « Un défenseur du peuple et le sbire d'un tyran, deux loyaux serviteurs aux idéaux contraires, deux âmes qui ont tout sacrifié sur l'autel du devoir. Je vois à présent que votre confrontation était inévitable. »
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert meets Kibellah's words calmly, with almost majestic resignation.{/n} "A defender of the people and a tyrant's minion are two faithful servants of opposing ideas, two souls that have rejected everything else for the sake of duty. I now truly see that your collision with him was inevitable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert réagit aux accusations de Kibellah avec un calme imperturbable mâtiné de résignation majestueuse.{/n} « Un défenseur du peuple et le sbire d'un tyran, deux loyaux serviteurs aux idéaux contraires, deux âmes qui ont tout sacrifié sur l'autel du devoir. Je vois à présent que votre confrontation était inévitable. »

languages.text: {n}Adalbert, Kibellah'nın sözlerini sakince, hatta görkemli bir teslimiyetle dinliyor.{/n} "Bir halk müdafisi ve bir tiranın bir piyonu... İki farklı idealin iki inançlı hizmetkârı... Vazifeleri uğruna geriye kalan her şeyi reddeden iki ruh... Onunla çarpışmanın kaçınılmaz olduğunu şu an görebiliyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert meets Kibellah's words calmly, with almost majestic resignation.{/n} "A defender of the people and a tyrant's minion are two faithful servants of opposing ideas, two souls that have rejected everything else for the sake of duty. I now truly see that your collision with him was inevitable."
